notes: Murphy was born in 1919. He talks about Norman Rockwell, Pete Llanuza, Franklin Booth, and other artists, and about Ben Bolt and Prince Valiant. Sidebar comments on Murphy by Neal Adams, Everett Raymond Kinstler, Bernard Fuchs, Angelo Torres, Al Williamson, Mort Walker, Cullen Murphy, and Gary Gianni.
